title: Get 10% off Vivian Chow Concert tickets now
subtitle: Fans, let’s celebrate the 30th Anniversary of Vivian Chow while she performs ‘A Long And Lasting Love’ LIVE in Genting!
description: Kindly prepare your Astro account number and Astro account holder's IC number before clicking the 'Redeem) buttin
Enter promotion code in the BUYTICKETS page to receive discount on your ticket.

By purchasing event tickets with BUYTICKETS, you (the Purchaser) agree to be bound by the Terms & Conditions of sale specified here in https://buytickets.com.my/v3/terms-conditions-2/and any other provisions as may be specified from time to time.
Prices are quoted in Ringgit Malaysia with processing fee of RM4.00 per ticket and handling fee of RM3.50 per ticket shall be included.
NO CANCELLATION, REFUND or ticket EXCHANGE allowed once ticket is sold.
LOST or DAMAGE ticket will not be entertained.
Complimentary ticket cannot be resold or offered for sale. BUYTICKETS reserves the rights to confiscate those complimentary tickets.
The Organiser shall bear no responsibility for the Purchase made by the Customer.

title: Nikmati diskaun 10% & laluan ekspress ke Konsert Didi & Friends!
subtitle: Didi & Friends kini muncul dengan konsert interaktif LIVE untuk menghiburkan si kecil anda pada 15 sehingga 18 Ogos di Quill Convention Centre, KL!
description: Sila sediakan no. akaun Astro serta no. kad pengenalan pemegang akaun Astro tersebut sebelum menekan butang “REDEEM” untuk mendapatkan kod promo.

Dengan kod promo, pelanggan Astro akan menikmati diskaun eksklusif 10% untuk pembelian setiap 4 tiket (Pakej Keluarga). Terhad untuk 2,000 tiket pertama. Kod promo hanya boleh digunakan sekali sahaja.
Pelanggan Astro boleh menikmati laluan ekspress ke konsert dengan menunjuk bil kertas atau e-billing di lokasi konsert nanti. Terhad kepada 100 pelanggan Astro pertama untuk setiap persembahan.
Untuk pembelian tiket dengan kod promo dan maklumat lanjut, sila layari www.didilive2019.com

title: Swing your way for just RM400 at Astro Masters 2019
subtitle: pecial entry fee including breakfast, lunch & a goodie bag worth RM400.
description: Malaysia’s most popular amateur golf tournament is back!
Kindly click on the above "Visit Link" for online registration.
Astro customers can register at a special fee of RM400 per person (Retail price: RM600).
The Grand Finalists will play for the right to be crowned as ‘Astro Masters Champion Golfer of the Year’ in Taipei, Taiwan.

The tournament calendar will see four premier golf courses making their debut to the delight of participants. The new venues are Palm Garden Golf Club, The Els Club Teluk Datai, The Els Club Desaru Coast and Glenmarie Golf & Country Club.
Registration for the Subscriber Rounds is on a first-come, first-served basis via the official entry forms at participating clubs.
Visit www.tfcmgolf.com for more info.

title: GINTELL exclusive promotions for Astro subscribers
subtitle: Get a GINTELL massage chair or sofa for you and your family.
description: Kindly present Astro physical bill statement or e-billing at any GINTELL retail store(s) and roadshow(s) in Malaysia for this promotion.
Promotion 1 : GINTELL DéSpace U.F.O-X The No.1 Humanise Massage Chair + GINTELL Magnetic Bike GT234 at RM16,988 or RM353.92 per 48 months* RSP: RM26,988
Promotion 2: GINTELL Dévano SC The Complete Massage Sofa + GINTELL G-Flex Plus Neck and Shoulder Massager at RM5,488 or RM152.44 per 36 months* RSP: 7,988
Promotion 3 : GINTELL G-Beetle Plus at RM1,288 RSP RM2,588
Promos are not exchangeable for cash or other items and not valid with any other ongoing promotions.
Promos are subject to stock availability and on first-come, first-served basis.
Customer(s) MUST present photocopy of Astro statement/bill before transaction.
Customer(s) is entitled for GINTELL Grand Lucky Draw campaign based on tiers.
VALID at all GINTELL retail store(s) and roadshow(s) in Malaysia.
GINTELL (M) Sdn. Bhd reserves the right to change these terms and conditions and/ or replace the gift item with other items with similar value without prior notice.
